title: Perfect
lyrics:
[intro] (A)
 
I found a (A)love for (Gbm)me
Darling just (D)dive right in, and follow my (E)lead
Well I found a (A)girl beautiful (Gbm) and sweet
I never (D)knew you were the someone waiting for (E)me
 
Cause we were just kids when we (A)fell in love
Not knowing (Gbm)what it was, I will not (D)give you up this (A)tiii(E)ime
But darling just (A)kiss me slow, your heart is (Gbm)all I own
And in your (D)eyes you’re holding (E)mine [pause]
 
Baby, (Gbm)I’m (D)dancing in the (A)dark, with (E)you between my (Gbm)arms
(D)Barefoot on the (A)grass, (E)listening to our (Gbm)favorite song
When you (D)said you looked a (A)mess, I whispered (E)underneath my (Gbm)breath
But you (D)heard it, darling (A)you look (E)perfect tonight
 
[interlude] | (A)  (E)  (Gbm)  (E) | (D)  (E) |
 
Well I found a (A)woman, stronger than (Gbm)anyone I know
She shares my (D)dreams, I hope that someday I’ll share her (E)home
I found a (A)love, to carry (Gbm)more than just my secrets
To carry (D)love, to carry children of our (E)own
 
We are still kids, but we’re (A)so in love, fighting a(Gbm)gainst all odds
I know we’ll (D)be alright this (A)tiii(E)ime
Darling just (A)hold my hand, be my girl, I’ll (Gbm)be your man
I see my (D)future in your (E)eyes [pause]
 
Baby, (Gbm)I’m (D)dancing in the (A)dark, with (E)you between my (Gbm)arms
(D)Barefoot on the (A)grass, (E)listening to our (Gbm)favorite song
When I (D)saw you in that (A)dress, looking so (E)beautiful
I (Gbm)don't de(D)serve this, darling (A)you look (E)perfect tonight
 
[interlude] | (A)  (Gbm) | (D)  (E) |  
 
Baby, (Gbm)I’m (D)dancing in the (A)dark, with (E)you between my (Gbm)arms
(D)Barefoot on the (A)grass, (E)listening to our (Gbm)favorite song
I have (D)faith in what I (A)see, now I know (E)I have met an (Gbm)angel
In (D)person, and (A)she looks (E)perfect
[single strum] No I (Gbm)don't de(D)serve this, (A)you look (E)perfect tonight
 
[outro, normal strum] | (A)  (E)  (Gbm)  (E) | (D)  (E) | (A-single strum) [end]
